traits.name: Flourish
entries: The captain adds its Charisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).

traits.name: Sea Legs
entries: The captain has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The captain makes two attacks: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.
